text: Harvey L. Vanier is a trainer of Thoroughbred racehorses. With his wife Nancy Aiken-Vanier, they own and breed racehorses on their Fairberry Farm in Waterloo, Illinois. ==References== * Thoroughbred Times profile of Harvey and Nancy Vanier and their Fairberry Farm * Harvey and Nancy Vanier and their Fairberry Farm website *Two-time Blue Grass Stakes-winning trainer Harvey L. title: Harvey L. Vanier
